text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Tyumenyakovsky Selsoviet, Tuymazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 143 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 17 km from Tuymazy, 5 km from Tyumenyak. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tuymazinsky District
title: Pokrovka, Tuymazinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
